title: What is Deep Learning | Deep Learning Explained | Deep Learning Tutorial For Beginners | Simplilearn
excerpt: This video on "what is Deep Learning" will help you understand what is Deep Learning, why do we need Deep Learning, applications of Deep Learning, what is a neural network, what are activation functions, what is gradient descent, neural network prediction from scratch. This video is designed for beginners
